title: Chinese Steamed Halibut
ingredients: ['450g fillet halibut', '1 teaspoon coarse sea salt', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh ginger', '3 tablespoons thinly sliced spring onions', '1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1 tablespoon light soy sauce', '1 tablespoon groundnut oil', '2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil', '4 tablespoons fresh coriander sprigs']
